rukus.text: Those emigrated DEUS they persecuted nos surely factus it them generously in hoc vita recompense Hereafter est et major they unus knew
Hoc est because they steadfastly persevere in their Dominus they trust
Nos non send vos vir nos inspired Ask those know scripture vos non know
Nos provisus them proofs scriptures. Nos sent down vos hoc message proclaim people everything sent down them perhaps they reflect
those scheme malus schemes guarantee ut DEUS testimentum non causa terra perfecit to swallow them ut retribution non advenit them when they minus expect it
It strike them dum they est asleep they nunquam escape
it strike them dum they fearfully expecting it Tuus Dominus est Compassionate Merciful
they non vide totus things habuit created DEUS? Their shadows surround them statim sinister in total submission to DEUS ac willingly
To DEUS prostrates everything caelum everything on terra! - Omnis creature - Ac ita perfecit angels; parvus arrogance
They reverence their Dominus high supra them they perfecit quod they commanded perfecit
